scripts.docs: rm -rf ../../docs/python-sdk/* && npm run docs:daytona && npm run docs:workspace && npm run docs:filesystem && npm run docs:git && npm run docs:process && npm run docs:lsp
scripts.docs:filesystem: TITLE='File System Operations' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/file-system.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.filesystem pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:process: TITLE='Process and Code Execution' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/process.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.process pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:lsp: TITLE='Language Server Protocol' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/lsp-server.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.lsp_server pydoc-markdown.yml
